original_title: Firearm permits for crop protection to be issued: State Defence Minister
original_body_lines: The existing laws for the use of firearms for crop protection purposes have been amended, State Minister of Defence Premitha Bandara Tennakoon said.
Accordingly, it has been decided to revise the extent of the agricultural land area to five (05) acres for the issue of these permits.
The State Minister said the decision was taken as a matter of urgency since large amounts of crops are being destroyed annually by various wild animals.
Minister Tennakoon further said the government is working on diverse programmes to promote and strengthen the agricultural economy and food security in the country.
He said details on the use of firearms for crop protection activities can be obtained from the respective District Secretariats.
